title: Pocket Feathers
description: 2\" squares of sheer, plain double weave. A single, heavier thread in a golden color with 1\" white threads hanging from it divides the squares.  This heavier thread stays within the layers of double weave. 2\" squares of sheer, plain double weave. A single, heavier thread in a golden color with 1\" white threads hanging from it divides the squares.  This heavier thread stays within the layers of double weave. Dawn
